Brief description of game 
In the year 2020,

Human race faced the biggest threat as an unexpected happened. A sudden outbreak of a deadly virus which not only threaten our lives but also threaten our contact with everyone we love. 

Nothing seem to be the end of this pandemic but the only thing that seem to have kept us alive is unity. 

United by love, irrespective of race..
We stand to stop the spread of this virus simply by loving each other as we help identify and match the viruses, aiding us destroy and  put an end to the threat that faces humanity
